PaymentTnCMessage: By clicking "Agree and purchase" you agree to all terms and conditions associated with this purchase
PriorityBoardingTermsAndConditionsList: pbTandC1|Priority Boarding is offered only for flights operated by United and United Express®, and is subject to availability.~pbTandC2|Priority Boarding benefits only apply to flights for which they are purchased.~pbTandC3|Priority Boarding may occur after certain MileagePlus Premier Members have boarded.~pbTandC4|Customers who are traveling on a Basic Economy ticket cannot purchase Priority Boarding.~pbTandC5|If you make voluntary changes to an itinerary for which you’ve purchased Priority Boarding, your Priority Boarding benefits will automatically transfer to the flights on your updated itinerary that are operated by United or United Express, if available. However, if you cancel your itinerary entirely, your Priority Boarding purchase will not be refunded.~pbTandC6|For flight cancellations or involuntary schedule changes, we will transfer Priority Boarding to the new itinerary. If requested prior to flight to which Priority Boarding has been transferred, Priority Boarding for canceled flights will be refunded.~pbTandC7|Priority Boarding does not exempt passengers from check-in time limits.~pbTandC8|When available, you can purchase Priority Boarding for multiple people on your reservation. Priority Boarding must be purchased for each individual traveler in order for them to receive the benefits of Priority Boarding.~pbTandC9|“Priority Boarding” must be displayed on your boarding pass in order to receive benefits.~pbTandC10|This offer is made at United’s discretion and is subject to change or termination at any time with or without notice to the customer.
TPIPurchaseResposne-ConfirmationResponse: A confirmation email has been sent to
PremierAccessTermsAndConditionsList: paTandC1|This Premier Access offer is nonrefundable and non-transferable~paTandC2|Voluntary changes to your itinerary may forfeit your Premier Access purchase and  any associated fees.~paTandC3|In the event of a flight cancellation or involuntary schedule change, we will refund  the fees paid for the unused Premier Access product upon request.~paTandC4|Premier Access is offered only on flights operated by United and United Express.~paTandC5|This Premier Access offer is processed based on availability at time of purchase.~paTandC6|Premier Access does not guarantee wait time in airport check-in, boarding, or security lines. Premier Access does not exempt passengers from check-in time limits.~paTandC7|Premier Access benefits apply only to the customer who purchased Premier Access  unless purchased for all customers on a reservation. Each travel companion must purchase Premier Access in order to receive benefits.~paTandC8|“Premier Access” must be printed or displayed on your boarding pass in order to  receive benefits.~paTandC9|This offer is made at United's discretion and is subject to change or termination  at any time with or without notice to the customer.

SocialDistanceSeatDisplayMessageDetailBo: We're limiting advance selection of adjacent and middle seats in all cabins and alternating window and aisle seats in rows of two on United and United Express flights. Please call or ask a gate agent if you'd like seats together. Seats currently blocked might not remain empty for your flight.

InterlinLHHtmlText: <html><body><p>To change your seat assignment(s) for this flight, visit <a href={lufthansaLink}>lufthansa.com</a></p></body></html>
DOTBagRules: Baggage allowances and fees|United accepts one carry-on item of no more than 45 linear inches or 114 linear centimeters in the aircraft cabin, along with one personal item (such as a shoulder or laptop bag).| |In general, checked baggage fees are charged at any point in the itinerary where bags are checked. For itineraries operated exclusively by United or United Express, standard fees will apply to checked baggage with a maximum weight of 50 pounds (23 kg) per bag and a maximum outside linear dimension of 62 inches (157 cm) as follows:| |Within the U.S. (including Hawaii, Puerto Rico and the U.S .Virgin Islands) and between the U.S. and Canada: First checked bag $25, second checked bag $35|Between the U.S./Canada and the Caribbean: First checked bag $25, second checked bag $40|Between the U.S. and Mexico/Central America: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $40|Between the U.S. and Asia/Australia/New Zealand/Micronesia/Europe/Middle East/South America (except Brazil and Venezuela): First checked bag $0, second checked bag $70|Between the U.S. and Africa: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $70 (Fee applies only to/from Egypt/Malawi/Morocco/Zambia; all other African countries have a $0 second bag fee.)|Between the U.S. (except Hawaii) and Japan: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $0|Between Hawaii, Micronesia and Japan: First checked bag $0, second checked bag $40| |First and second checked bag fees do not apply to active-duty members of the U.S. military and their accompanying dependents, customers confirmed in United PolarisSM First, United First®, United PolarisSM Business or United Business�, or to United Global ServicesSM, MileagePlus® Premier® 1K®, Premier Platinum, Premier Gold or Star Alliance® Gold members, or Presidential PlusSM or MileagePlus Club primary credit cardholders. First checked bag fee does not apply to MileagePlus Premier Silver or Star Alliance Silver members, or MileagePlus Explorer or OnePassSM Plus primary credit cardholders.| |For additional information regarding checked baggage fees, allowances, weight/size restrictions, exceptions, embargoes, or overweight, oversized, odd-sized and sporting equipment charges, go to united.com/baggage and select your special items and restrictions category.| |For travel itineraries that include flights operated by our alliance partners or other airlines, different baggage fees may apply. Learn more at united.com/baggageservices.
FarelockPurchaseMessage: Please visit the full version of united.com to complete the purchase of this reservation.
EarnedMilesText:
Award miles shown are the miles that can be earned for this flight. Mileage accrued will vary depending on the terms and conditions of your frequent flyer program. United MileagePlus mileage accrual and other benefits of MileagePlus associated with air travel are subject to the rules of the MileagePlus program.

You can earn up to 75,000 award miles per ticket. The 75,000 award miles cap may be applied to your posted flight activity in an order different than shown.
IneligibleToEarnCreditMessage: This itinerary includes one or more flights that are ineligible to earn mileage or Premier qualifying credit.
OaIneligibleToEarnCreditMessage: Ineligible to accrue mileage or Premier qualifying credit.
otfConversionAlert: To book new flights with credit select "Change flights" below.
FFC_Policy_Info: A travel waiver is in effect for your reservation. <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/travel/notices.html'>Read the details of the waiver</a> to see if fees may be waived for any changes made to your reservation.
PNRScheduleChangeKeeptrip: This updated itinerary works for you without any additional changes. You can still make changes or cancel later.
PNRScheduleChangeChangeflights: See options to make a one-time change at no cost<br/>Select this option to search for other flights. You may have the option to make a one-time change at no cost if your new flight meets these conditions:<br/>||<Ul><li>Your new travel date is not more than 1 day before or 1 day after the original date</li><li>Your departure and destination airports remain the same</li><li>Your new ticket is in the same cabin and fare class as the original ticket</li><li>Your new flight is operated by United or United Express</li></Ul>
PNRScheduleChangeCanceltrip: See options to cancel trip<br/>This updated itinerary does not work for you. Select this option and continue to review options for canceling your trip and requesting a refund.
PNRScheduleChangeCommmonContent: A schedule change has impacted your trip, which means the details of one or more of the flights in your itinerary have changed. The changes to your trip are indicated below (under your confirmation number).<br/><br/>
PNRScheduleChangeContentD: If the changes don't work for you, you may have the option to change or cancel your flight. <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/US/fly/help/faq/schedule-changes.html' >Learn more about our schedule change policies</a>.<br/><br/>Please review the options below and select one before continuing:
PNRScheduleChangeContentB: Most schedule changes are minor, but if the changes don't work for you, we'll do our best to find you a new flight. <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/US/fly/help/faq/schedule-changes.html' >Learn more about our schedule change policies</a>.<br/><br/>Please review the options below and select one before continuing:
PNRScheduleChangeContentC: If the changes don't work for you, you may have the option to cancel your flight and request a refund. <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/US/fly/help/faq/schedule-changes.html' >Learn more about our schedule change policies</a>.<br/><br/>Please review the options below and select one before continuing, or <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/contact.html' target=\'_blank\'>contact United Customer Service</a> to see if other options are available:
PNRScheduleChangeContentE: If the changes don't work for you, <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/contact.html' target=\'_blank\'>contact United Customer Service</a> to see if other options are available. <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/US/fly/help/faq/schedule-changes.html' >Learn more about our schedule change policies here</a>.
PNRScheduleChangeContentA: Most schedule changes are minor, but if the changes don't work for you, other options may be available. <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/US/fly/help/faq/schedule-changes.html' >Learn more about our schedule change policies</a>.<br/><br/>If you booked this trip through a travel agency, a travel website or an airline other than United, you should contact them for assistance with your reservation.
PNRScheduleChangeContactUs: If you need further assistance, <a href='https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/contact.html' >contact us</a>.
PNRPSSAScheduleChangeAlert: A schedule change has impacted your trip, Which means the details of one or more of the flights in your itinerary have changed. The changes to your trip are indicated below.<br/><br/>Most schedule changes are minor, but if the changes don't work for you, other options may be available through your employee pass travel tools.
manageresfacecoveringmsgheader: Travelers are required to wear a face mask
manageresfacecoveringmsgbodyHtml: Federal law requires all travelers to wear a face mask with no vents or openings that fully covers their nose and mouth.<br/><br/>Masks must be worn in the airport and during the entire flight, and between bites and sips if travelers are eating or drinking. This includes customer service counters and kiosks, airport lounges, gates and baggage claim areas. A face shield alone does not count as a face covering. Travelers who aren't wearing their masks in the airport or on board may be refused transport, be subject to fines, and could also lose their travel privileges on future United flights. Children younger than 2 years old are exempt.<br/><br/><a href="https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/travelers/face-masks-public-transportation.html" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
manageresfacecoveringmsgbodyText: Federal law requires all travelers to wear a face mask with no vents or openings that fully covers their nose and mouth.|Masks must be worn in the airport and during the entire flight, and between bites and sips if travelers are eating or drinking. This includes customer service counters and kiosks, airport lounges, gates and baggage claim areas. A face shield alone does not count as a face covering. Travelers who aren't wearing their masks in the airport or on board may be refused transport, be subject to fines, and could also lose their travel privileges on future United flights. Children younger than 2 years old are exempt.|
MRTravelWaiverHdr: A travel waiver is in effect for this trip.
MRTravelWaiverDesc: We're waiving change fees when you rebook your travel.
MRTravelWaiverAltDtRngHdr: If you decide to make a change to your reservation, change fees and any difference in ticket price will be waived if the change you make follows these guidelines:
FFC_AGENCY_ALRTMSG: This ticket was booked through a third party agency. Unless authorized, please contact your original ticketing agency to rebook. Future Flight Credits/Unused tickets are subject to audit for policy compliance.
RESHOP_JSE_NONCHANGEABLE_INSIDE24HRS: header|Free cancellation available.||body|This reservation qualifies for our 24-hour flexible booking policy. If you want to change your itinerary, please cancel and rebook your ticket.
RESHOP_JSE_NONCHANGEABLE_OUTSIDE24HRS: header|This ticket cannot be changed or refunded.||body|If you cancel your flight, the cost of this ticket cannot be credited towards your original payment method or as a travel credit.
RESHOP_JSE_NONCHANGEABLE_CANCEL_OUTSIDE2: header|This ticket was not refunded.||body|When you canceled your flight, the cost of the ticket wasn't credited towards your original payment method or as a travel credit.
ResDtlSCOneTimeChangeCancel_Content: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change or refund.||Because of a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you can make a limited one-time change to your flight for free.||Change your flight||View cancel and refund options
ResDtlSCOneTimeChange_Content: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change.||Because of a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you can make a limited one-time change to your flight for free.||Change your flight||View cancel options
ResDtlSCOneTimeChange: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change.||Due to a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you have the option to make a one-time change to your flight(s) at no cost.<br/><br/>Your new flight must meet these conditions:<ul><li>Your new travel date is not more than 1 day before or 1 day after the original date</li><li> Your origin and destination airports remain the same</li><li>Your new ticket is in the same cabin and booking class as the original ticket</li><li> Your new flight is operated by United and United Express</li></ul>Select "Change flight" below to search for new flights.
ResDtlSCOneTimeChangeCancel: This trip is eligible for a free one-time change or refund.||Due to a prior schedule change impacting your trip, you have the option to make a one-time change to your flight(s) at no cost, or cancel and request a refund.<br/><br/>Your new flight must meet these conditions:<br/><ul><li>Your new travel date is not more than 1 day before or 1 day after the original date</li><li> Your origin and destination airports remain the same</li><li>Your new ticket is in the same cabin and booking class as the original ticket</li><li> Your new flight is operated by United and United Express</li></ul>To make a one-time change, select "Change flights" below. To review cancel and refund options, select "Cancel options".
PartnerAirlinesSpecialTravelNeedsHeader: This flight is operated by our partner
PartnerAirlinesSpecialTravelNeedsMessage: This itinerary contains travel on other partners. Please reach out to the other partners for special needs requests on their flights.
